content: this chenille plush no-sew pocket reindeer crochet pattern is the perfect amigurumi project for deer lovers pocket reindeer crochet along video right hand https //youtu be/8ekkif7e8ae left hand https //youtu be/qdj20h3rxwu beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -magic_ring -single_crochet -increasing 2 stitches into one stitch -decreasing join 2 stitches into 1 -double_crochet -half_double_crochet -slip_stitch -small bobble -bobble -fastening off this no-sew pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions pictures and video tutorial to help you along the way pocket reindeer is crocheted in the round/continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round pocket reindeer is crocheted in super bulky chenille yarn and is approximately 3 5 inches tall including antlers be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed to make pocket reindeer -super bulky 6 weight yarn i used premier parfait chunky chenille yarn -h 5mm crochet hook -two 14mm plastic safety eyes not recommended for children under 3 years old -polyfil or stuffing of your choice -yarn needle -scissors -locking stitch markers optional do not distribute alter sell or share this pattern please feel free to sell the items you make from this shop
